definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: You can take Ginza line and get off at the station of Omotesando.
sentences.chinese: 你可搭銀座線，在表參道站下車。

sentences.english: When at Ginza in Tokyo, as Chinese we must mention about that billboard of Haier.
sentences.chinese: 去東京銀座，作爲中國人必提到海爾的那塊廣告牌。

sentences.english: Saya then began "working" at Takashimaya in Ginza where she sits at the store's information desk.
sentences.chinese: 塞婭坐在商店服務檯，開始在銀座的高島屋“工作”。

sentences.english: And there were eight boards； and their sockets were sixteen sockets of silver， under every board two sockets.
sentences.chinese: 有八塊板和十六個帶卯的銀座，每塊板底下有兩卯。

sentences.english: So there were eight frames and sixteen silver bases-two under each frame.
sentences.chinese: 有八塊板和十六個帶卯的銀座，每塊板底下有兩卯。

sentences.english: The others are in the Ginza district.
Its expansive atmosphere aims to fill the role of an inviting open space on Ginza Dori .
sentences.chinese: 開敞的氣氛是爲了在銀座大街的露天廣場吸引遊人。

sentences.english: The system now applying on the project of property management of yinzuo digital plaza of jinan.
sentences.chinese: 本系統目前應用在濟南銀座數碼廣場物業管理項目上。

sentences.english: This ticket is only good as far as Ginza.
sentences.chinese: 這張車票最遠只到銀座。

sentences.english: As golden pillars upon bases of silver, so are the firm feet upon the soles of a steady woman.
sentences.chinese: 她那雙在結實腳跟上的美腿，有如銀座上的金柱。

definition: Tokyo, capital of Japan/Tonkin (northern Vietnam during the French colonial period)
Lanshan district of Rizhao city 日照市[Ri4 zhao4 shi4], Shandong
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
Nakajima or Nakashima (Japanese surname and place name)
Ginkakuji or Silver pavilion in northeast Kyōto 京都, Japan/officially called Jishōji 慈照寺[Ci2 zhao4 si4]
Miyazaki prefecture in east Kyūshū 九州, Japan
Kōbe, major Japanese port near Ōsaka
